details.title: Experimental set-up of laser ultrasonic techniques and applications
details.abstract: A laser ultrasonics generation and non-contact detection system has been developed. The weak generated ultrasonic signal of nanosecond duration and nanometer amplitude can be detected with a confocal Fabry-Perot interferometer (CFPI). It can be applied to determination of elastic constants of material and flaw detection. The experimental results show that laserultrasonic technique is practical and effective.
